languages.text: "Если потомки павшей придут за элантахом, кровавый цикл продолжится. Жизнь за жизнью. Поколение за поколением. Пока одна сторона не перестанет существовать".
"If the fallen mon-keigh's descendants come after the elantach, the bloody cycle will continue. Life after life. Generation after generation. Until one side ceases to exist."
languages.original_text: "Если потомки павшей придут за элантахом, кровавый цикл продолжится. Жизнь за жизнью. Поколение за поколением. Пока одна сторона не перестанет существовать".

languages.text: “如果那个死了的猴子的后人打算追杀外界人的话，那么血腥的循环将会继续下去。一个又一个生命，一代又一代，直到其中一方不复存在为止。”
languages.original_text: "If the fallen mon-keigh's descendants come after the elantach, the bloody cycle will continue. Life after life. Generation after generation. Until one side ceases to exist."

traits.locale_text: “如果那个死了的猴子的后人打算追杀外界人的话，那么血腥的循环将会继续下去。一个又一个生命，一代又一代，直到其中一方不复存在为止。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Si les descendants de la mon-keigh viennent s'en prendre à l'elantach, alors commencera un cycle sanglant. Vie après vie. Génération après génération. Jusqu'à ce que l'une des deux maisons cesse tout simplement d'exister. »
languages.original_text: "If the fallen mon-keigh's descendants come after the elantach, the bloody cycle will continue. Life after life. Generation after generation. Until one side ceases to exist."

traits.locale_text: « Si les descendants de la mon-keigh viennent s'en prendre à l'elantach, alors commencera un cycle sanglant. Vie après vie. Génération après génération. Jusqu'à ce que l'une des deux maisons cesse tout simplement d'exister. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Si los descendientes de la mon-keigh caída persiguen a{mf|l| la} elantach, el ciclo de sangre continuará. Una vida tras otra, una generación tras otra, hasta que un bando u otro deje de existir».
languages.original_text: "If the fallen mon-keigh's descendants come after the elantach, the bloody cycle will continue. Life after life. Generation after generation. Until one side ceases to exist."

traits.locale_text: «Si los descendientes de la mon-keigh caída persiguen a{mf|l| la} elantach, el ciclo de sangre continuará. Una vida tras otra, una generación tras otra, hasta que un bando u otro deje de existir».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「堕落したモン＝ケイの末裔がエランタの後任になれば、血なまぐさい循環が続く。生涯に次ぐ生涯の間。世代に次ぐ世代の間。どちらか一方が絶滅するまで続くのだ」
languages.original_text: "If the fallen mon-keigh's descendants come after the elantach, the bloody cycle will continue. Life after life. Generation after generation. Until one side ceases to exist."

traits.locale_text: 「堕落したモン＝ケイの末裔がエランタの後任になれば、血なまぐさい循環が続く。生涯に次ぐ生涯の間。世代に次ぐ世代の間。どちらか一方が絶滅するまで続くのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn die Nachfahren des gefallenen Chem-Pan-Sey Jagd auf den Elantach machen, setzt sich der blutige Kreislauf fort. Leben für Leben. Generation für Generation. Bis eine Seite aufhört zu existieren."
languages.original_text: "If the fallen mon-keigh's descendants come after the elantach, the bloody cycle will continue. Life after life. Generation after generation. Until one side ceases to exist."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn die Nachfahren des gefallenen Chem-Pan-Sey Jagd auf den Elantach machen, setzt sich der blutige Kreislauf fort. Leben für Leben. Generation für Generation. Bis eine Seite aufhört zu existieren."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "If the fallen mon-keigh's descendants come after the elantach, the bloody cycle will continue. Life after life. Generation after generation. Until one side ceases to exist."

languages.text: "Yitik mon-keighlerin torunları elantach'ı takip ederse kanlı döngü sürecek. Candan cana, nesilden nesile. Ta ki bir taraf yok olana kadar."
languages.original_text: "If the fallen mon-keigh's descendants come after the elantach, the bloody cycle will continue. Life after life. Generation after generation. Until one side ceases to exist."

traits.locale_text: "Düşmüş mon-keighlerin torunları elantachı takip ederse kanlı döngü sürecek. Yaşam ardına yaşam. Nesil ardına nesil. Ta ki bir taraf yok olana kadar."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
